title: Immigration Client Manager
job_overview:
We are a US immigration law firm hiring for a client manager role.

The client manager role is responsible for communicating with prospective clients, sending contracts to prospective clients, answering questions, following up, and closing deals.

The position comes with base pay and a generous bonus structure.

The ideal candidate will have some familiarity with US immigration law and some familiarity with sales.

More details can be found below:

The Position
Immigration Client Manager

Qualifications:
Familiarity with business and/or family-based immigration
Prior sales experience or willingness to learn sales skills
Strong organizational skills
Highly responsive
Excellent written and oral communication skills
Willingness to learn

Responsibilities:
Communicate with prospective immigration clients
Answer questions from prospective clients
Screen prospective clients for the immigration benefits they are applying for
Send contracts to prospective immigration clients.
Follow-up with prospective immigration clients

Why Should You Apply?
Base pay with a generous performance-based bonus structure
